Html:
Hi i have a problem about the data validation
i hava a validation which accept only number's 1 or 0
but when the user try to paste other number except 1 or 0
it accept it?
is there a way to prevent this? thanks

php version 5.3.9 running on iis7 phpexcel 1.7.6

How have you set up your cell validation: what is your code for this?

 

Most likely cause is that you aren't using  

$objValidation->setErrorStyle( PHPExcel_Cell_DataValidation::STYLE_STOP );
